contentrichtext.text: '''Yumiko Fujita''' (藤田 弓子; born 12 September 1945 in [[Meguro, Tokyo|Meguro]], [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]]) is a Japanese [[actress]]. ==Selected filmography== * ''[[Under the Flag of the Rising Sun]]'' (1972) * ''[[Karafuto 1945 Summer Hyosetsu no Mon]]'' (1974) * ''[[The Bullet Train]]'' (1975) * ''[[Muddy River (film)|Muddy River]]'' (1981) * ''[[Seburi monogatari]]'' (1985) * ''[[Drugstore Girl]]'' (2003) == External links == * [http://www9.plala.or.jp/yumiko-f/ Official Site] {{ja icon}} * {{Imdb name|id=0297855|name=Yumiko Fujita}} * [http://www.jmdb.ne.jp/person/p0310080.htm Profile at JMDb] {{ja icon}} {{Authority control|VIAF=232506624}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Fujita, Yumiko | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 12 September 1945 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Fujita, Yumiko}} [[Category:Japanese actresses]] [[Category:1945 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Actors from Tokyo]] {{Japan-actor-stub}}
